column4: Make changes in RedRaphael for text bound fade in and fade out
Need to hide consolidated tooltip on touch outside the chart in touch devices
In IE8, some data labels do not appear in msstackedcolumn2d when animation attribute is set to 1
For all column and bar charts, all values are not showing in IE8
Hovering over any plots, last or first plot will also hover for line and area charts when anchor-image is given
